com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase.avro
Class AvroEntitySerDe<E extends IndexedRecord>

java.lang.Object
  com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase.EntitySerDe<E>
      com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase.avro.AvroEntitySerDe<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The type of entity this SerDe works with.
public class AvroEntitySerDe<E extends IndexedRecord>
extends EntitySerDe<E>

An EntitySerDe implementation that serializes and deserializes Avro records.

AvroEntitySerDe

public AvroEntitySerDe(EntityComposer<E> entityComposer,
                       AvroEntitySchema avroSchema,
                       AvroEntitySchema writtenAvroSchema,
                       boolean specific)
Constructor for AvroEntitySerDe instances.

Parameters:
entityComposer - An entity composer that can construct Avro entities
avroSchema - The avro schema for entities this SerDe serializes and deserializes
writtenAvroSchema - The avro schema a record we are reading was written with
specific - True if the entity is a Specific avro record. False indicates it's a generic
